bad_N_cells = 10.5
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    GriSPy(self.data, N_cells=bad_N_cells, periodic=self.periodic, metric=
        self.metric, copy_data=self.copy_data)
bad_N_cells = -10
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    GriSPy(self.data, N_cells=bad_N_cells, periodic=self.periodic, metric=
        self.metric, copy_data=self.copy_data)
